titles.title: Lord I Lift your name on High

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord I Lift your name on High

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord I want to sing your praise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I'm so glad you're in my heart

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I'm so glad you came to save us

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: You came from heaven to earth...to show the way

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: From the earth to the cross...My debt to pay

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: From the cross to the grave

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: From the grave to the sky
